title: Looking for Staff for High Elo Competitive 2016 Roster
body:
As the title says, the team will be looking for staff to aid with the growth and development of the new roster. We're currently looking for eager and enthusiastic individuals  to take on managerial positions as well as knowledgeable analysts/coaches to prepare the roster for future tournaments. 

Vacant Position(s):
    Manager/Owner
    Analyst
    Coach    

Desirable traits for the position(s) are:
    Flexible Hours
    Dedication and a passion for eSports   
    Good work ethic
    Past coaching experience
    Ability to work well with others 
    Appropriate communication skills

As a result of the team recently signing with an established organisation, the vacant staff positions may eventually be payed for by the organisation.

Add me in game on "Jawedtn" or simply reply to this post and we'll get back to you ASAP.

replies.body:
Hi there,

I am interested in applying for the Analyst position for your organisation. I have done previous work with multiple individual players from a wide variety of skill levels and positions , improving both their success in the game and my personal ability to effectively analyse and give feedback. Now I'm looking to expand the skills I have learned and apply them to a team, and this seems like a great opportunity.

Looking forward to hearing back from you!
Added you in game, hope to talk soon - Brindyyy
I would like to join, add me for a discussion - Garawdu
